@graph.title: State-building in Europe : the revitalization of Western European integration
abstract: Western Europe's move toward political union / Volker Bornschier -- Tying up the Luxembourg package of 1985 / Patrick Ziltener -- The origins of the Single Market / Nicola Fielder -- Esprit and technology corporatism / Simon Parker -- EC regional policy: monetary lubricant for economic integration? / Patrick Ziltener -- EC social policy: the defeat of the Delorist project / Patrick Ziltener -- Lobbying for a Europe of big business: the European Roundtable of Industrialists / Michael Nollert in collaboration with Nicola Fielder -- Biotechnology in the European Union: a case study of political entrepreneurship / Michael Nollert -- European integration after the Single Act: changing and persisting patterns / Patrick Ziltener -- The state of the European Union / Volker Bornschier
